TestPage.title: Test Page
TestPage.subtitle: Clean slate for testing - Device Registration

TestPage.tokenInstructions:
To get your Google ID token:
1. Go to Login Page and sign in
2. Open browser DevTools (F12) → Console tab
3. Run: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('purecare_auth')).idToken
4. Copy the token and paste it here
TestPage.pasteTokenPlaceholder: Paste your Firebase ID token here...
TestPage.authTokenSet: Auth token set! You can now register devices.
TestPage.aqiIntegrationDescription:
If you provide your location, we'll automatically:
• Find the nearest air quality monitoring station
• Detect your timezone (no manual selection needed!)
• Cache real-time AQI data for your device
